title: Pervert caught performing sex act in petrol station forecourt said 'it’s just something I do when I’m bladdered'
text:

A pervert caught caught pleasuring himself in a petrol station forecourt in front of horrified customers told police: "It's just one of those things I do when I'm bladdered." 
A father with his 10-year-old daughter were among the horrified witnesses who saw Benjamin Berry performing the sex act in Liverpool. 
The furious dad shouted: "What the f***ing hell are you doing? I've got my kid in the car." 
Christopher Taylor, prosecuting, told Liverpool Crown Court : “Thankfully it’s not clear from his account that she was a witness to this defendant’s disgusting behaviour.” 
Berry, 30, from Liverpool, was arrested after the dad called the police. 
Another customer also saw him performing a sex act at the petrol station at 7.30pm on December 13, the Liverpool Echo reports . 
The drunken pervert told police he had downed eight pints of beer plus spirits in a drinking session with his boyfriend, which began at midday. 
He was spared jail after admitting outraging public decency and possessing a small quantity of cannabis. 
He received a community order in 2010 for the same sexual offence at Liverpool Lime Street station toilets. Read More Pervert bombarded girl, 14, with messages saying 'Hey sexy legs' and told child 'your age don't bother me' Berry was spared jail at Liverpool Crown Court (Photo: MEN) 
Berry also received a community order in 2012 after he admitted masturbating in front of a 14-year-old boy in Bootle, Merseyside. 
In August 2015 he was handed a three-year community order, after exposing himself in a sex shop in Liverpool city centre. 
Staff asked him to leave but then spotted him masturbating outside the Private Shop in August 2013. 
When challenged by police about his behaviour, he said: “It’s just one of those things I do when I’m bladdered.” Read More Kinky couples write Trip Advisor-style reviews of the best dogging hotspots for saucy outdoor sex sessions 
Berry was taken back to court last August after breaching his community order and failing to sign on the Sex Offenders Register. 
He received a 12-month conditional discharge for missing probation appointments and neglecting to reveal he had started seeing a sex offender. 
The judge, Recorder David Turner, QC, today initially said he thought “the time had come for a prison sentence”. 
He added: “There comes a time when giving people community orders and them just ignoring them, it makes a mockery really of the system, doesn’t it?” Berry was also caught touching himself in a sex shop in Moorfields, Liverpool (Photo: Liverpool Echo) 
But Christopher McMaster, defending, said Berry only behaved in an “appalling” way when drunk and argued he needed support. 
He said his client was a sex worker previously addicted to heroin and crack cocaine, but had been free of Class A drugs for a year. 
Mr McMaster said Berry was prone to binge drinking, adding: “None of these offences appear to happen when he is sober.” Read More Ten weird and wonderful (for some) bizarre sex fetishes from cow slurry to clown love 
Recorder Turner said “most members of the public would expect you to go to prison” but he was convinced Berry needed help. 
He gave him a 10-month prison sentence, suspended for two years, and a three-month home curfew from 7.30pm to 7.30am. 
He also fined Berry £50 fine over the cannabis and told him to carry out an alcohol treatment programme and a rehabilitation activity requirement. Like us on Facebook
